name: Attack of the Trafalas
description:
Attack of the Trafalas is a fighting sim set in the digital multiverse where anything may happen. Fight your way to the top of the evil robot organization that you have created and turned against you, now you have to shut it down by becoming the best version of yourself, physically, mentally and electronically to combat the biggest evil organization the multiverse has ever seen which goal is to exterminate mankind in every reality.

AOTT is a beat 'em up video game series. The series features super martial artist "Player 1" as he fights against various adversaries and rivals from different realities in an arena like linear level system. The game features a digital currency system which you will be able to trade for in-game features, items, etc. for the official release.
